#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
#define p(x) cout<<#x<<":"<<x<<"\n"
#define lim 1000004
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long

ll i,j,cs,n,k,p;
bool B[lim];
vector <ll> V;
ll I[lim];

ll be(ll b,ll e)
{
  ll x;
  
  if(!e)
    return 1;
  x=be(b,e/2);
  x=x*x%mod;
  if(e&1)
    x=x*b%mod;
  return x;
}
ll f(ll p)
{
  ll res;

  res=(be(p,k+1)+mod-1)%mod;
  res=res*I[p]%mod;
  res=(res+mod-k-1)%mod;
  res=res*I[p]%mod;
  return res;
}
int main()
{
  for(i=2;i<lim;i++)
    if(!B[i])
	{
	  V.push_back(i);
	  I[i]=be(i-1,mod-2);
	  for(j=i*i;j<lim;j+=i)
	    B[j]=1;
	}
  cin>>cs;
  ll cnt;
  while(cs--)
  {
    cin>>n>>k;
	for(i=0,p=1;V[i]<=n && (!cnt || V[i]<=999990);i++)
	  p=p*f(V[i])%mod;
    cout<<p<<"\n";
	if(++cnt==2)
	  break;
  }  
  return 0;
}
